tool_description:
Find street art and graffiti works with geographic location.
Scan  street art artists and graffiti writers
name: Street Art
title: Street Art

api_list.name: city
api_list.description:
Scan streetart and graffiti by city. Insert a city name, may also be an incomplete name.
(Retrieves 125 randomly picked items by city name)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://street-art.p.rapidapi.com/city/Los"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "street-art.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://street-art.p.rapidapi.com/city/{city}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "street-art.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: country
api_list.description:
Scan streetart by country.
Retrieves 125 random streetart works by inserted country. May also be an incomplete name.
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "street-art.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: writer
api_list.description:
Query streetart and graffiti by author aka writer. 
May also be an incomplete name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://street-art.p.rapidapi.com/writer/Bank"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "street-art.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: year
api_list.description:
Scan the streetart by creation year.
Retrieves 50 randomly picked items of this year.

api_list.name: random
api_list.description: Retrieves the randomly picked street art items.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://street-art.p.rapidapi.com/random/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "street-art.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://street-art.p.rapidapi.com/random/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "street-art.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
